title: Drawing, "Albright Art Gallery: Room Plans", ca. 1932
medium: Graphite and orange color pencil on tracing paper
dimensions: H x W: 96.5 x 110.5 cm (38 x 43 1/2 in.), irregular
description:
Drawings of streamlined vehicle and gooseneck desk lamp in upper right corner. Wall elevation and perspective drawings of furniture at center. Elevation at left shows shelving or desk to left, door to right, clock above door. Elevation at right shows series of open shelves across wall. Three tall rectangular windows above with blinds and orange drapery (on one window at left). Rectilinear library table with built in (?) lighting fixture. Long, rectilinear light supported by two bases on top of table. Four orange upholstered armchairs around table. Chairs upholstered on back, seat, and armrest. Straight legs, curved armrests, squared chair backs and seat. Plaid, orange upholstered armchair at right with squat, square profile.

Room plan in lower portion contains single desk in upper left corner, desk at right with six chairs, desk below on right with six chairs, desk at lower left with four chairs. Three club chairs each positioned in upper right corner, upper left corner, and lower left corner of room. Doorway on lower right wall. Desk and chair positioned perpendicular to door entrance, shelf or counterspace behind desk on right wall. Shelves line the lengths of all walls.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Albright Art Gallery: Room Plans", ca. 1932.
ca. 1932. Graphite and orange color pencil on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-303.
